1.title: Open for Business
1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: In Templeton GA there reside 2 thriving and 1 struggling Black business. These businesses are ran by elite African Americans whose families came through the great depression and the Civil Rights era, therefore not only do these business owners have pride they have a since of historical relevance to the communities they reside in. The families running these businesses are the Graysons, the Franklins and the Bakers. The Graysons and the Bakers have been in competition since their grandparents ran their businesses. Today they know they need to partner to grow but stubbornness and pride is presenting this from happening. The Franklins continue to create and produce new product and now they finally have something they feel will sell like light bread if they can only get the distribution they need. Through a tough economy, town hall meetings, business trips, love stories and family arguments these families still strive to be the best that they can be.
